ARENA.info: Genosha has been overrun by the forces of Apocalypse.
ARENA.title: Genosha

ARENA.info: An ancient monument to a long forgotten alien race.
ARENA.title: Monument

ARENA.info: The central room in a dark temple.
ARENA.title: Madri Temple

ARENA.info: Slave pens holding mutants used for genetic research.
ARENA.title: Slave Pens

ARENA.info: Part of Apocalypse's tower in New York City.
ARENA.title: Apocalypse Tower

COURSE.hint: To smash crates and barrels, press $ATTACK.
COURSE.intro: It is often worthwhile to examine the setting around you, because pleasant surprises may be hiding inside anything.
COURSE.name: FR101
COURSE.outro: Well Done!  When you beat Danger Room courses and do particularly well, you can earn special prizes.
COURSE.title: Setting 101 - Hidden Goods

COURSE.intro: When you are low on health, avoid directly engaging your enemies. Instead, it is often safer to attack enemies at long range by picking up and throwing objects at them.
COURSE.name: FR102
COURSE.title: Setting 102 - Throwing

COURSE.intro: Some chains of attack moves can pack an extra strength. For example, attacking three times in a row is a simple way to do more damage.
COURSE.name: FR103
COURSE.outro: Excellent.\n\nTraining against characters here in the danger room will give you valuable experience just as it does in the field. So if you are finding your missions too difficult, you can always return to the danger room and take or retake training courses to increase your skills.
COURSE.title: Moves 103 - Triple Hit

COURSE.hint: To pick enemies up, press $GUARD. Outside of the Danger Room, only heroes with the Grab skill can throw enemies.
COURSE.name: FR104
COURSE.title: Moves 104 - Throw

COURSE.intro: Your teammates can help you out of a difficult situation.
COURSE.name: FR105
COURSE.title: Teamwork 105

COURSE.hint: Time your power attack with an ally to combine powers.
COURSE.intro: When two heroes use their powers at the same time, the combination is always more powerful.
COURSE.name: FR107
COURSE.title: Combined Powers 107

COURSE.intro: Often, X-Men are called upon to defend the innocent, Mutant and Human alike, from aggressors.\n\nIn this simulation, you've rescued Beast but the forces of Apocalype are trying to kill him before you can get him off of the ship.
COURSE.name: SO204
COURSE.title: Defend 204

COURSE.hint: Hint: During character challenges, you have unlimited energy, so use your Mutant Powers.
COURSE.intro: You may need to protect items from those who would destroy them. In this course, agents of Apocalypse are trying to destroy the knowledge contained in the Genoshan library.
COURSE.name: CHCYC
COURSE.title: Challenge - Cyclops

COURSE.hint: Hint: During character challenges, you have unlimited energy, so use your Mutant Powers.

COURSE.intro: Destroy the five generators that power Apocalypse's underground labratory facility.
COURSE.name: Online101
COURSE.outro: Good job! Beat all 3 difficulty challenges to gain Character Unique Gear! Also be sure to look for online exclusive concept art pickups!
COURSE.title: Online Course 101

COURSE.intro: Find the hidden Madri library and destroy the five Ancient Power Cores that Apocalypse has hidden within.
COURSE.name: Online102
COURSE.outro: Good job! Beat all 3 difficulty challenges to gain Character Unique Gear! Also be sure to look for online exclusive concept art pickups!
COURSE.title: Online Course 102

COURSE.intro: An onslaught of thugs has attacked a nightclub looking for Dazzler. Find and protect her and any other innocent bystanders.
COURSE.name: Online103
COURSE.outro: Good job! Beat all 3 difficulty challenges to gain Character Unique Gear! Also be sure to look for online exclusive concept art pickups!
COURSE.title: Online Course 103

COURSE.intro: Ninjas have invaded a Japanese temple and cemetery! Defeat all of the ninjas and the watch out for the leaders!
COURSE.name: Online104
COURSE.outro: Good job! Beat all 3 difficulty challenges to gain Character Unique Gear! Also be sure to look for online exclusive concept art pickups!
COURSE.title: Online Course 104

COURSE.intro: Locate two hidden storage caves and destroy Apocalypse's equipment.
COURSE.name: Online105
COURSE.title: Online Course 105
